thread.title: Ed Sheeran becomes honorary doctor
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran becomes honorary doctor | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Ed Sheeran becomes honorary doctor
text:
Ed Sheeran tries on his robes before receiving an honorary degree from University Campus Suffolk in Ipswich for his "outstanding contribution to music" Credit: Chris Radburn/PA Wire Ed Sheeran is returning to his home county of Suffolk to receive an honorary degree for his "outstanding contribution to music".
The 24-year-old singer-songwriter is to be awarded an honorary doctorate from University Campus Suffolk (UCS) in Ipswich.
Sheeran, who grew up in Framlingham, Suffolk, and left school at 16, said he was "honoured" to receive the award.
Ed Sheeran left school at 16 and said he was Credit: Joe Giddens/PA Wire "I've had an amazing year with my world tour and this makes it even better. "Suffolk is very much where I call home and I'm always welcomed back and get so much support. Receiving this recognition is a real privilege."
â€“ Ed Sheeran Click below to watch Ed Sheeran on ITV News Anglia with Becky Jago
Play video Click for more pictures of Ed in his university robes Sheeran, whose hits include Thinking Out Loud, Lego House and Sing, has become of one of the world's biggest music stars after selling millions of copies of his albums + and x.
His debut concert film, Jumpers For Goalposts, which was filmed during three sell-out performances at Wembley Stadium in July, is to be shown in cinemas from Thursday 22 October.
Ed Sheeran performing on stage during Fusion Festival 2015 at Cofton Park, Birmingham Credit: Joe Giddens/PA Wire Honorary degrees will also be awarded to author Ronald Blythe, former ice dancer and Dancing On Ice judge Nicky Slater, and Maureen Reynel, who founded the charity Find, which provides emergency help to people affected by poverty or dispossession.
More than 1,200 UCS students will be awarded their degrees at ceremonies in Ipswich this week.
Last updated Mon 19 Oct 2015 Read more 2 updates Ed Sheeran honoured Entertainment Ed Sheeran Suffolk
